DOC.criteria: Primary liver transplant recipient . Transplanted liver function acceptable level 24 h posttransplant Patients start tacrolimus therapy within 12 h posttransplant Previous transplantation multiple organ transplantation Acute rejection Nonheart beating donor Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply .
